Talk: Folk who helped make 2017 what it was</title><description>Future historians may wonder how we stayed calm in the face of 2017&#8217;s global economic and nuclear threats let local drug overdosing, homelessness and, for many, unreachable real-estate prices. They may also conclude that 2018&#8217;s perils vastly exceeded those before. For now, though, here are some folk from this column who helped give 2017 its [&#8230;]</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Fri, 29 Dec 2017 18:18:06 Z</pubDate><enclosure Hoffman facing sexual harassment allegations from three women, including daughter’s childhood friend</title><description>Cori Thomas, a playwright, said she spent an afternoon with Hoffman and his daughter Karina in 1980 when she was a 16-year-old student. He allegedly disrobed and asked for a massage</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Sat, 16 Dec 2017 19:19:08 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16323981.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Dustin Hoffman facing sexual harassment allegations from three women, including daughter’s childhood friend" href="http://nationalpost.com/entertainment/celebrity/dustin-hoffman-facing-sexual-harassment-allegations-from-three-women-including-daughters-childhood-friend" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16317243</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/hallmark+channel+wraps+holidays+vancouver+style/16317243/story.html</link><title>Hallmark Channel wraps up the holidays, Vancouver style</title><description>It takes some special skills to be in a Hallmark Channel holiday movie. &#8220;You learn while you are bundled up in a coat and gloves and a hat and sweating a lot how to do that little cold shiver, when it is 90 degrees out,&#8221; laughed actor Danica McKellar about the common practice of filming [&#8230;]</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Sat, 16 Dec 2017 03:52:55 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16317244.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Hallmark Channel wraps up the holidays, Vancouver style" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/celebrity/hallmark-channel-wraps-up-the-holidays-vancouver-style" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16318056</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/news/national/douglas+todd+good+warriors+return+public+life/16318056/story.html</link><title>Douglas Todd: The Warrior returns to public life</title><description>There is a war between the rich and poor, A war between the man and the woman. There is a war between the ones who say there is a war And the ones who say there isn&#8217;t. &#8230; Why don&#8217;t you come on back to the war, let&#8217;s all get nervous &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#8212; There is [&#8230;]</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Fri, 15 Dec 2017 21:02:48 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16318057.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Douglas Todd: The Warrior returns to public life" href="http://vancouversun.com/opinion/columnists/douglas-todd-the-good-and-bad-of-warriors-return-to-public-life" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16305414</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/news/world/after+testy+john+oliver+exchange+dustin+hoffman+accused+more/16305414/story.html</link><title>After testy John Oliver exchange, Dustin Hoffman accused of more sexual misconduct</title><description>Playwright Cori Thomas was a 16-years-old classmate of Hoffman's daughter when she met the actor in 1980</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Fri, 15 Dec 2017 20:33:10 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16305415.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="After testy John Oliver exchange, Dustin Hoffman accused of more sexual misconduct" href="http://nationalpost.com/news/world/dustin-hoffman-accused-of-new-incidents-of-sexual-misconduct" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16318043</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/books/town+talk+soon+abdicate+emperor+akihito+birthday/16318043/story.html</link><title>Town Talk: Soon-to-abdicate Emperor Akihito's birthday celebrated</title><description>84 CANDLES: Japanese Canadians and others filled the Bayshore hotel&#8217;s ballroom recently at a birthday party for Emperor Akihito, who will be 84 on Dec. 23. It was a bittersweet celebration because of the previous day&#8217;s official acceptance of his request to abdicate on April 30 in favour of Crown Prince Naruhito. So said Consul [&#8230;]</description><source>Celebrity News</source><pubDate>Fri, 15 Dec 2017 20:00:49 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/16318044.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Town Talk: Soon-to-abdicate Emperor Akihito's birthday celebrated" href="http://vancouversun.com/entertainment/television/town-talk-soon-to-abdicate-emperor-akihitos-birthday-celebrated" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=16317252</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/kelly+derrickson+puts+first+nations+pride+healing/16317252/story.html</link><title>Kelly Derrickson puts First Nations pride and healing into songs</title><description>Kelly Derrickson has her grandfather to thank for the twang in her tunes, and her heritage for the lyrical honesty in her music.
